name: Fake News Rumble Bot
description:
A text based multiplayer game implemented as a Discord Bot about false information online. Each round, the players are given a real headline with a missing part they need to fill using randomly selected phrases taken from other headlines. The resulting Fake News are then shown to everyone along with the real headline mixed in and players vote on which is the real one. You get points for voting correctly, but you get more points for fooling others with your headline! Your vote is shown in real time to other players so there is  some room for mind games...

Installation Instructions: This is a Discord Bot so you cannot simply download and play it. You need to either find an instance of this bot in the wild or create your own.

You currently need to run the project files from an IDE since there as no time left in the game jam.

Type !help for instructions and more commands

This bot was made as part of the Cologne Games Network Game Jam. If you are interested in the source code, you can view the repository on GitHub.
